data.description: A hyperactive ninja who dreams of becoming Hokage. He wields immense chakra and carries the Nine-Tails within him.
Last survivor of the Uchiha clan's massacre. Driven by revenge, he wields the Sharingan and lightning-based techniques.
A Saiyan raised on Earth, known for his boundless strength and pure heart. Always seeks stronger opponents.
Prideful Prince of the Saiyan race. He's a fierce rival to Goku and driven by personal strength and legacy.
A human who becomes a Soul Reaper, Ichigo protects the living and the dead with his massive spirit energy.
A noble Soul Reaper with a calm presence and strong sense of duty. She mentors Ichigo and uses graceful ice-based attacks.
Captain of the Straw Hats and a rubber man with a dream of becoming Pirate King. Fearless, goofy, and loyal to his crew.
A swordsman who uses three katanas with brute force and unmatched willpower. He’s fiercely loyal to Luffy.
A carefree yet overpowered sorcerer. Gojo’s cursed techniques and his domain expansion make him nearly untouchable.
A strong-willed teen who became a Jujutsu sorcerer by housing Sukuna’s cursed power. Fights with raw emotion and purpose.
A stoic, elite soldier of humanity. Known for his precise, deadly moves and unmatched agility in titan combat.
Driven by freedom and revenge, Eren holds the power to control titans and reshape the fate of the world.
A kind-hearted demon slayer seeking to cure his sister. Wields a sword with elegant, fluid techniques.
A demon who protects humans. Though silent, she fights fiercely with explosive blood techniques.
A genius high schooler with a god complex. Uses a deadly notebook to eliminate criminals in secret.
An eccentric, world-class detective. Solves cases with raw intellect and strange, unpredictable behavior.
A bored superhero who defeats enemies in a single punch. Struggles more with boredom than battles.
A serious cyborg seeking strength and vengeance. Loyal to Saitama and relentless in combat.
A deadly warrior driven by loyalty to Eren. Mikasa is calm, calculating, and nearly unstoppable in battle.
A river spirit in human form who helps Chihiro. Mysterious and kind, he fights for her freedom.
The Fullmetal Alchemist, a brilliant but stubborn prodigy. Sacrificed greatly to seek redemption for his brother.
A gentle soul trapped in a giant suit of armor. He’s wise, calm, and often more mature than his older brother.
A demon maid with unwavering loyalty and strength. Fights ferociously but loves with quiet intensity.
A half-elf with a pure heart and mysterious past. Uses ice-based magic and radiates calm gentleness.
Mysterious and manipulative, she controls others with eerie calm. Beautiful, terrifying, and unreadable.
A broke devil hunter turned half-devil. He’s raw, honest, and craves love as much as battle.
A graceful, poison-wielding Hashira. Her smile hides rage for demons who took her sister.
A quiet, emotionless pilot with a mysterious origin. She’s essential to humanity’s survival, yet barely human.
A short volleyball prodigy with boundless energy and a burning desire to fly. His spirit inspires everyone.
The progenitor of all demons. Charismatic, cruel, and nearly immortal — he changes form at will and rules from the shadows.
